entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 27 at 3:08PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...STRONG WINDS AND HEAVY RAIN EXPECTED FOR PORTIONS OF SE ALASKA FOR THE WEEKEND... A storm force low and front move into the AK Gulf from the W early Saturday before weakening as it moves eastward by Sunday. entry.title: Flood Warning issued October 27 at 10:31AM EDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Above Lake Harney affecting Seminole County. .The St. Johns River above Lake Harney at Geneva remains in Major Flood Stage. The river is forecast to continue a slow decline, dropping from Major to Moderate Flood Stage by this weekend. Interests along the river will continue to see major flood impacts,

entry.title: Flood Warning issued October 27 at 10:30AM EDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Deland affecting Lake and Volusia Counties. .The Saint Johns River at Deland will hover very close to Major Flood Stage, but continue to decline through Moderate Flood Stage into next week. Flood conditions will steadily but slowly improve. For the St. Johns River...including Deland...Moderate flooding is

entry.title: Flood Warning issued October 27 at 10:30AM EDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Sanford affecting Seminole County. .The Saint Johns River at Sanford is forecast to remain in Moderate Flood Stage through early next week while continuing a slow decline. entry.title: Flood Watch issued October 27 at 4:09PM AST by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. Expect additional rainfall amounts of 2 and 4 inches and locally higher amounts. * WHERE...All of Puerto Rico, Vieques, Culebra, and the U.S. Virgin Islands.
entry.cap:areaDesc: St Croix; St.Thomas...St. John.. and Adjacent Islands

entry.title: Wind Advisory issued October 27 at 4:27PM PDT until October 27 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...San Juan County, Western Whatcom County, Western Skagit County, Everett and Vicinity and Admiralty Inlet Area. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Admiralty Inlet Area; Everett and Vicinity; San Juan County; Western Skagit County; Western Whatcom County
